statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', recommended_articles = '{"title": "Example Article", "url": "https://example.com/article"}' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 100;

UPDATE user_profiles SET recommended_articles = '[{"title": "Database Management Systems", "url": "https://example.com/dbms"}]', belief_categories = ARRAY['Technology', 'Science'] WHERE username = 'alice_smith';
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE recommended_articles SET article_title = 'New Article Title', article_content = 'This is the content of the new article' WHERE article_id = 5;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='updated_email@example.com', username='updated_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE recommended_articles SET article_title='New Article Title', article_content='New Article Content', belief_category='Science' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE article_recommendations SET belief_category = 'health' WHERE article_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', belief_category = 'Technology' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE article_recommendations SET article_description = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla nec velit id orci ullamcorper tristique.' WHERE article_id = 201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', beliefs='Updated beliefs' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE articles SET category='Tech', content='Updated content', title='New Title' WHERE article_id=2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET beliefs = 'New beliefs for user' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE articles SET category = 'Technology', content = 'Updated content' WHERE article_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 25, belief_category = 'Technology' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET content = 'New content added.', author = 'John Doe', published_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE articles SET title = 'New Title', content = 'Updated content' WHERE article_id = 5;
